body.name: Gillette Styler, 1 Beard Trimmer for Men with 1 ProGlide Razor Blade Refill, 1 Battery, 3 Comb Attachments, Waterproof
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 8 mins
features: INCLUDES: 1 trimmer, 1 ProGlide blade refill, 3 comb attachments (for different hair lengths), 1 battery, and an organizer
3 COMB SIZES (2mm, 4mm, 6mm) for customizing your style
FITS ALL GILLETTE 5-BLADE RAZOR REFILLS (excluding GilletteLabs)
BEARD TRIMMER with Braun engineered technology; Easy grip handle for precise trimming.
body.description: The All Purpose Gillette Styler trims evenly, shaves closely, and edges precisely. The Styler has everything you need to achieve any facial hair style: Trim - Waterproof trimmer is complete with three exchangeable combs (2mm, 4mm, 6mm) for consistent length and contour adaptability; Shave - Gillette ProGlide razor blades for men, from the brand you trust, deliver a close and comfortable shave; Edge - Precision Trimmer creates crisp, defined lines and finishing touches. Powered by Braun-engineered technology, the Styler is waterproof and shower safe, letting you trim while you shower. The All Purpose Styler lets you easily master any style with one precision tool. Works with any Gillette 5-blade razor refill.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #7,730 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #21 in Beard Trimmers

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Frequently Asked Questions What are the differences between the exchangeable combs? The 3 exchangeable combs offer you consistent length and contour adaptability for easy upkeep of your favorite style. Whether it's an intricate facial hairstyle, or strategically groomed body hair, you'll be able to master your best look. When should I use the Precision Trimmer? After you've trimmed your facial hair, sideburns, or body hair to your desired length, use the Precision Trimmer to polish your look and complete your favorite style. For best results, should the power be turned on or off when using the Precision Trimmer? The Precision Trimmer can be used with the power turned on or off. Preference varies from person to person. Using the Precision Trimmer with or without power is an individual choice. What type of battery does the Gillette Styler use? How long does it last? The Gillette Styler uses a AA battery. Assuming average shaving, the battery should last approximately 1-1.5 months, depending on the user. Is it safe to shave with the Gillette Styler in the shower? Yes. The Gillette Styler is watertight and totally safe to use in wet environments. Can I get electrocuted if the Gillette Styler is submerged in water? No. Gillette Styler is safe to use in wet conditions. Will the Gillette Styler accept any other razor blade refill on the market? The Gillette Styler is compatible with any Gillette Fusion5 refill.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All around best
reviews.reviewText: Super affordable, works better than half the expensive crap out there. Eventually the motor does get tired, but then again it's only like 20 bucks. I have owned several, lost one, wore out another, still using two of them. Excellent product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to use. Does a great job
reviews.reviewText: Like. Hair styling like a pro.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good ball trimmer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product for a great price comes with attachments for different shaves. Small and easy to store for travel

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For a inexpensive razor this has a ton of power. Uses a AA battery so no losing the charger with this one. It says waterproof so I'll check that. It's small and lightweight and has several attachments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great. Fair price
reviews.reviewText: Would buy again My second one. First one lasted 10 years. I broke the locking tab. My fault not the product. Has a good motor in it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and convinient
reviews.reviewText: My husband want only this one. When his previous died, he ask me to find exact same thing again
Cheap in price and its a great for mens use
product was used and full of hair

This is My Second Time Buy.. Had Bought it From Local Market Four Years Ago.. Had Costed Over Rs 2000.00 That Time.. So Costing is Definately Good.. I Have Used the Product For 4 Years with Various Degrees of Roughness.. So I Know it's Durable.. Yes The Trimmer is Not So Awesome That it Will Trim in One Go.. But Then Most Trimmers are Like That.. This One's Way Above Average.. The Razor is Awesome.. So Happy With It

reviews.reviewTitle: A very handy device for hair cutting, moustache and beard trimming.
reviews.reviewText: This is the second one of these we have bought. Now we have one at home and one on holidays. We use it for home hairdressing and moustache trimming. Highly recommend it.
